name: Once Upon a Wall presented by Fully Booked Theatre

shows.title: Once Upon a Wall
shows.desc:
Kids and adults alike join in the fun as Hum-T leads you on her dancing adventure through the streets of Lost Sandwiches. Build a giant wall, throw down some signature moves, and watch one very large egg scramble to the top.

Fully Booked Theatre is a dance theatre company specialising in interactive performances for children blending the worlds of dance and poetry.

Venue: The Lawn
